title: Bug 49536 - If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, I expect to receive a HTTP error 404 response indicating that the resource is not found.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
